dialogue.name: Hmph... maybe you are improving. Understand how painful it is for me to admit that over singing about burgers.
Good vibes and good eats! This trip was so worth it!
It's not just about the food, gramps, it's about the atmosphere! Any place is a good place for music!
Not bad... but I think Allegro Burgers tastes just a bit better.
Robots eating food is just a goddamn waste. Let the humans consume this greasy slop.
